text: dharmaya himi ayavaluni! ibrahim gæna (ohu yudevveku vasayen ho nætahot kristiyanuveku vasayen ho sitiyehiya yayi) kumak nisa nikarune tarka karamin sitinneda? (yudevvange dharmaya vana) tavratayada, (kristiyanuvange dharmaya vana) injilda ohugen itamat dirgha kalayakata) pasuvama pahala viya. (metaram dæyakvat) oba dæna gata yutu noveda
